title: Godlovesyou
author: Godlovesyou
content: I understand that children or teenagers are not allowed to know so many things especially sex activities but this days if you don't teach them someone else will.So we are in a modern world where things are fast changing. What do you think? Is good to teach your children sex education or thy should be allow to grow on their terms? Is sex education good for a child?

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: Teaching about the dangers is good, else don't do it, let them learn on their own, you just warn them about the consequences.

comments.author: Ucy
comments.created_time: March 10, 2023, 10:13:48 AMLast edit: March 10, 2023, 10:36:52 AM by Ucy
comments.body: Quote from: Godlovesyou on March 09, 2023, 06:10:33 PMI understand that children or teenagers are not allowed to know so many things especially sex activities but this days if you don't teach them someone else will.So we are in a modern world where things are fast changing. What do you think? Is good to teach your children sex education or thy should be allow to grow on their terms? Is sex education good for a child?When it comes to such education, better to teach them to keep their virginities and the consequences of not doing so. Always monitor what they consume, watch or see. Get them to be very open to you about things that involve sex they consumed, saw, watched or feel. Make sure to destroy every sexual seed that may have been planted in their minds with good opposites, else the seeds grow in them and they become slaves to sexual sins. If they are overcome by lust, get them isolated for couple of days and feed them with things that suppress the lust. Feed them with the Word of GOD especially where the evil of lust and its consequences is specifically mentioned. Repeat it several times until the Words heal them. At the right time, you could teach them about their sexual parts and what they are used for, how to take care of them(like keeping it clean) and how to and how not to use them. Teach them never to mingle with pervert as they could be turn into pervert. Teach them never to stay alone with the opposite sex. They should only be in public where speaking about sex or getting involved in sexual activities is frowned at, or at home in the presence of responsible guardian/parentBelow is the Word of GOD in Audio form. Feed them especially with Proverbs (number 20) and the New Testament Compilation of the 66 Books Of The Christian Holy Bible from Genesis to Revelation, all in Audio form:✴️ Old Testaments1— Genesis comments.author: bitterguy28
comments.body: Quote from: Godlovesyou on March 09, 2023, 06:10:33 PMI understand that children or teenagers are not allowed to know so many things especially sex activities but this days if you don't teach them someone else will.lol who told you that teenager are not allowed to know many things about sex?QuoteSo we are in a modern world where things are fast changing. What do you think? Is good to teach your children sex education or thy should be allow to grow on their terms? Is sex education good for a child?well it is still parents prerogative to let their children learn or not.

comments.author: Car22
comments.body: Yes it is very bad to learn sex education on child base . Leave them on their own way . They learn good from their own way. We can simply advice our child that sex is bad things during adult stage .

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Families who have little boys and little girls running around naked in front of each other, these families have started sex education. When these little ones as why they are different, the simple answer is that some people are boys and some people are girls.Once the kids get used to this idea, and once they start to become modest, they will remain dressed in front of each other as they grow older. They will remember that their question was answered when they were little, and might not ask again.At the time of puberty, parents should be sensitive towards their kids and start training them about where people come from.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: I think Sex education for kids is a good idea. Sex education for kids especially at a young age can teach a child about when is the right time to have sex and prevent unwanted pregnancies. And for an adolescent stage understand that abstinence is important and if they do decide to have sex how to practice safe sex. There is sex education available in certain schools that allows parents to give the authorization for kids to attend the class. This is the good parenting part and the knowledge that a kid gives will be so much helpful for a good future.

comments.author: MaterialMouse69
comments.body: Quote from: Godlovesyou on March 09, 2023, 06:10:33 PMI understand that children or teenagers are not allowed to know so many things especially sex activities but this days if you don't teach them someone else will.No one said they are not allowed. But watching and learning this kind of stuff is too much for them to handle. As they learn new ideas which can led to bad decisions. In school they already teach how sex can affect their body so they already know the consequences of sex. Even at high school they teaching kids to have safe sex. It means that sex its part of our needs but in a right age. We only prefer to have sex activities when adult since they can take care of themselves already when consequences happen.Quote from: Car22 on March 10, 2023, 04:43:35 PMYes it is very bad to learn sex education on child base . Leave them on their own way . They learn good from their own way. We can simply advice our child that sex is bad things during adult stage .It's not bad to learn sex education for child. You can teach them in a simple way where they can easily understand without watching some adult stuff which is uncomfortable for them. If you let them to learn in their own, they might try it themselves because we all know the children in their age let curiosity wins.

comments.author: Bruce4
comments.body: Quote from: Godlovesyou on March 09, 2023, 06:10:33 PMI understand that children or teenagers are not allowed to know so many things especially sex activities but this days if you don't teach them someone else will.So we are in a modern world where things are fast changing. What do you think? Is good to teach your children sex education or thy should be allow to grow on their terms? Is sex education good for a child?There have been various debates and arguments on if sex education should be taught to children,sex education isImportant as every other education is.Sex education is teaching a child about sexuality and everything that's related to sex.Teaching a child about sex is important,and should start before the puberty stage.Sex education should start with the parents,they have the responsibility of teaching them about sex in a safe and secured way.Although,some parents shy away from this lessons,and some considers it as ungodly,and some think the child is too young to be taught about sex.The thing is the education protects a child from sex abuse,molestation from friends and members of the society.As the children are growing up,sex education should be more audible and frequent to them,nothing should be left unsaid  to them,and allMisconceptions about sex should be cleared.It creates room for awareness,teaches them how to manage their sexual behavior,emotions and how to keep them safe in an unsafe Environment.

comments.author: Stoffric
comments.body: I think it's better for children not to know about it.

comments.author: Kath Bliss
comments.body: Sex education can be helpful for a child's development as long as it is done in a responsible way that is right for his or her age.

comments.author: Shielding2002
comments.body: Sex education for kids is a good idea. But most parents finds it difficult.

comments.author: Dhrugtest
comments.body: It's not that bad but it depend on age which the childs is before you teach them that, but here in my county people don't teach their child the sex education we I'll learnt it from schools.. 😂

comments.author: Kelward
comments.body: I think that sex education is good and very important for every child, especially in this modern days, that we have the internet. A child can pick up a phone and type anything and Google will be happy to give answers. They can search porn sites and watch explicit sex scenes without you an adult knowing. Some of them might have the urge to experiment. Also there are pervarts  and pedophile out there, who are willing to take advantage of this young ones. Although adults need to be cautious in teaching children about sex education. You need to consider the age of a child to know the kind of sex education that is appropriate for that age.

comments.author: thimotey_s
comments.body: No, sex education is not bad for a child. In fact, it can be very beneficial for children to receive age-appropriate information about sex and sexuality. Here are some reasons why:Promotes healthy sexual development: Sex education can help children learn about their bodies and understand the changes that come with puberty. This can help them develop a healthy attitude towards their own sexuality and promote positive sexual development.Encourages responsible behavior: Sex education can teach children about the importance of safe sex practices, contraception, and consent. This can help prevent unplanned pregnancies, sexually transmitted infections (STIs), and other negative consequences of irresponsible sexual behavior.Reduces stigma and shame: Sex education can help reduce the stigma and shame associated with sexuality. By providing accurate and age-appropriate information, children can develop a healthy attitude towards sexuality and reduce the likelihood of negative emotions such as guilt or shame.Increases knowledge and understanding: Sex education can help children develop a better understanding of sex and sexuality, which can help them make informed decisions about their own sexual health and behavior.

comments.author: cute nmp
comments.body: Not at all. Sex education is very good for every child, Think every person should educate his or her child about sex to protect them from sexual abuse and increase their overall confidence in public.

comments.author: cafter
comments.body: Quote from: Godlovesyou on March 09, 2023, 06:10:33 PMI understand that children or teenagers are not allowed to know so many things especially sex activities but this days if you don't teach them someone else will.So we are in a modern world where things are fast changing. What do you think? Is good to teach your children sex education or thy should be allow to grow on their terms? Is sex education good for a child?providing age appropriate sex education can help children to develop a healthy attitude towards sexuality and make safe choices, but it is up to parents to decide what is best for their child.

comments.author: koleusdat
comments.body: Sex education should be from an early age, otherwise with what modern children are now, you can become a grandfather at an early age.

comments.author: Albert_09
comments.body: We need to teach teens about safe sex, speed, hiv, and a host of other diseases that people get during adolescence
